price: Bamaze kubona nya bihano rero, bazoca bavuga bati: “Twemeye Imana Allah, twemeye n’Ibitabu hamwe n’Intumwa vyayo”. Bishoboka gute ko bashika ku kwemera mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa kandi baramaze kugera kure aho bitagikunda!
arabic: وَقَالُوٓاْ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُمُ ٱلتَّنَاوُشُ مِن مَّكَانِۭ بَعِيدٖ

meta.transliteration: waqālū āmannā bihi wa-annā lahumu al-tanāwushu min makānin baʿīdin
